channel.title: Death emote

item.title: Death emote
item.dc:creator: @Ancient_Arr0w Ancient Arr0w
item.description:
@Ancient_Arr0w wrote:

[code]removeAllItems();

		setAnimation(2304);			
		//pEmote = 15;
		//pWalk = 13;
		sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
		setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]);
		currentHealth = 99;
		ownedTimer = 8;
		hitDiff = 0;	
		updateRequired = true; 
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		teleportToX = 2604;
		teleportToY = 3876;
	}

}[/code]

how can i make it so that they do the emote before dying?

atm they do the emote AFTER being teleported, i want it to be like real runescape =[[br][size=1]Posted on: May 06, 2007, 04:32:44 PM[/size][hr]anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 06, 2007, 06:16:23 PM[/size][hr]dont want to make a new topic so im bumping =x
